analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol:
	Contract TokenSale has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol#215-217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TokenSale.icofinish (/unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol#161-162) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol#162)

TokenSale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol#190-193) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokens) (/unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol#191-192)
	-token.transfer(to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol#192)

TokenSale.hardcap should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol#119-122)
TokenSale.minInvestedLimit should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol#115-119)
TokenSale.price should be constant (/unique_chucks/39/0xffcab000bf0b3c6d900701ef1cc78f18fb5cc18d.sol#113-114)
